CPR.messages.cyberwareDeleteWarning: Before deleting this cyberware uninstall it first!

CPR.messages.multipleAbilitiesWithTheSam: Multiple abilities with the same name. Rename so that they are all unique.
CPR.messages.linkBlackIceWithoutToken: Only tokens can be linked to a Black ICE Program. Place this Actor into your scene and configure the Token to use the Black ICE program of your choice.
CPR.messages.noNetrunningRoleConfigured: No Netrunning role configured. Drag a role to your sheet and configure from the left pane on the character sheet.
CPR.messages.noValidAmmo: You have no ammo for that weapon, Choomba!
CPR.messages.ownedItemOnlyError: Error: Feature only enabled for items owned by a Character or Mook
CPR.messages.reloadOutOfAmmo: Sorry, Choomba, you can't do that, you're out of ammo!
CPR.messages.rezBlackIceWithoutToken: You have attempted to REZ a Black ICE from a World Actor, however that actor has no token linked to it, therefore a Black ICE Actor/Token can not be created. The Black ICE Program is only shown as REZ'd in the Cyberdeck.  You can de-rez it, place an Actor Token and re-rez it from the Token Character Sheet to create the Black ICE Actor.
CPR.messages.tooManyOptionalCyberwareIns: You have too many optional Cyberware installed, Choomba! Are you going full Borg??
CPR.messages.toomanyattachments: You have too many attachments installed, Choom!

CPR.messages.tradedragupgradewarn: Trading upgraded items is not supported in the system at this time.
CPR.messages.warnDeleteActiveRole: You deleted your active role. Active role now set to the following:

CPR.settings.automaticallyResizeSheets.h: Automatically resize actor and item sheets depending on the content.
CPR.settings.debugElements.hint: Show debugging elements in the UI, such as internal itemIDs
CPR.settings.debugElements.name: Debug Elements in UI
CPR.settings.debugLogs.hint: Enable debugging logs, filling them with useful info for system developers and testers.
CPR.settings.debugLogs.name: Debug Logs
CPR.settings.deleteConfirmation.hint: When enabled, deleting an item will prompt for confirmation
CPR.settings.deleteConfirmation.name: Delete item confirmation
CPR.settings.derivedStats.hint: When enabled, derived stats will be auto-calculated and can not be over-ridden
CPR.settings.derivedStats.name: Auto calcluate derived stats
CPR.settings.enablePauseAnimation.hint: Requires full reload to take effect (Ctrl+F5)
CPR.settings.enablePauseAnimation.name: Enable Pause Animation
CPR.settings.enableSheetContentFilter.hi: Enables a text box below Skills, Gear and Cyberware to allow you to quickly filter the lists to find what you're looking for
CPR.settings.invertRollCtrlFunction.hint: When enabled, roll dialogs are skipped by default and enabled when holding CTRL
CPR.settings.invertRollCtrlFunction.name: Invert function of CTRL on Rolls
CPR.settings.mookSheetSkillDisplay.hint: On the Mook sheet, choose how skills are displayed. You will need to re-open mook sheets for any change to take effect. Level = points in the skill only, Base = Level + Stat (this matches examples in the rule book), and Total = Level + Stat + Persistent Mods.
CPR.settings.mookSheetSkillDisplay.name: Mook Sheet Skill Display Options
CPR.settings.playersCreateInventory.hint: When enabled, players can create items directly in their inventory
CPR.settings.playersCreateInventory.name: Players can create items
CPR.settings.preventDuplicateCriticalInj: Off = Allow duplicate Critical Injuries. Warn = Warn if duplicate Critical Injury is apllied. Reroll = Reroll duplicate Critical Injuries.
CPR.settings.systemDataModelVersion.hint: Pin the system data model to a specific version. This will force or avoid data migrations and is VERY DANGEROUS. Only use this if you are tester or developer on the system module.
CPR.settings.systemDataModelVersion.name: System Data Model Version
CPR.settings.title: Settings
CPR.settings.traceLogs.hint: Enable trace logs. Turn this on when you are filing a bug or working with module developers on an issue.
CPR.settings.traceLogs.name: Trace Logs
